description:
Uh... Hello, everyone. I`m Yuru Yuri protagonist Akaza Akari.
...I`m the protagonist, right? It`s the final episode, but I can still call myself the protagonist with confidence, right? I was so confident in the first episode... sniffle. No, you mustn`t give up, Akari! Have confidence, Akari! Today`s our overnighter. It`s the perfect place to establish my presence! Come on, everyone, I`ll show you my brilliance!
Until we meet again!Until we meet again... Akarin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: みんなでポカポカ合宿へ
